mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (userName, passWord, encryptKey, email, avatar, privilege, isDeleted, createTime) VALUES (#{userName}, #{passWord}, #{encryptKey}, #{email}, #{avatar}, #{privilege}, 0, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET passWord = #{passWord}, email = #{email}, avatar = #{avatar}, privilege = #{privilege} WHERE id = #{id} and updateTime = #{updateTime} limit 1
UPDATE User SET isDeleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM User WHERE id = #{id} and isDeleted = 0 limit 1
SELECT * FROM User WHERE userName = #{userName} and isDeleted = 0 limit 1
SELECT * FROM User WHERE email = #{email} and isDeleted = 0 limit 1
